briefTitle: Prospective and Retrospective Breast Cancer Database
officialTitle: Creation of a Prospective and Retrospective Breast Cancer Database
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Database of patients with breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female patient
* Histologically confirmed breast cancer of any stage
* Affiliated to a social security system in france
* Who signed the informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Any psychiatric or medical condition that would make the patient unable to give a signed informed consent
